name: Impossible Dial: Brain Reflex & Cognitive Training
name_original: Impossible Dial: Brain Reflex & Cognitive Training
description:
Impossible Dial is an addictive game that tests your brain's reflexes and helps you improve your memory and focus.

Simply tap when the arrow is the same color as the part of the dial it is next to! Match as many colours as you can and see if you can get a new high score!
WARNING: Highly Addicting!

Features:
* Improves focus and short term memory
* Helps your child pay attention and retain information better
* Get better mental reflexes

A fun and addictive mind trainer created by Ben Pasternak, Alex Pelletier, Remy Carr and Tamir Triguboff.
